Desc.entry: Workshop-based classes in street, jazz and contemporary dance, for ages 3 years to adults. Runs a youth dance group, Dolly Mixtures - entry by audition. Also provides performance opportunities.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues 6-7pm (contemporary dance for young people aged 10 to 14 years), 7-8pm (adult street dance for people aged 16 years and over); Wed 5-6pm (street dance for young people aged 6 to 10 years), 6-7pm (street dance for young people aged 10 to 16 years), 7-8.30pm (Dolly Mixtures Youth Dance Group, intermediate/advanced level, for young people aged 14 to 21 years); Thurs 5-6pm (adult hip hop, beginners), 7-8pm (adult contemporary dance, open level); Fri 6pm-7pm (adult street dance with Khairul); Sat 11am-12pm (parent and toddler movement class), 1-2pm (ballet class), 2-3pm (mixed dance styles, for young people aged 3 to 6 years), 3-4pm (mixed dance styles, for young people aged 10 to 16 years)
